about_the_game:
"That's no tower, that's a spire!"

GREETINGS, BATTLER.

Arkhive has reported new metastructures have risen exponentially as of --- AD. Several Arkhivists have gone missing. This is no mere coincidence which we can ignore.

Your department- ARK-FC, "Frame Cleaners" has been dispatched to handle this. Your job is to neutralize any given threat inside your assigned spire to the best of your ability. Any arkhivist seen must be recovered- dead, alive, or what may be left for them.

Godspeed, battler.

Super Roomspire aka. "SPIREDELVE" is a COMPLETELY FREE endless "boomer shooter" retro 2.5D FPS that runs on the Hellish Battle engine for the Biggstation 2. You follow an Arkhive "Battle Specialist" sent down to investigate the strange and twisted metastructures arising out of the sudden globally.

YOUR FIELD ASSIGNMENT

Your job is to fend off and clear the path for your fellow comrades, the Frame Cleaners, who just seem to happen to be running late, eliminating any and all inorganic lifeforms that come your way, while also trying to recover any remains from previous Arkhivists to piece together for yourself on their fate, and why these spires keep appearing.

Developed by Culture Industry Interactive for the Biggstation 2. Inspired by the 'Blox Cards' Lore Chronology.

WORKING BUILDS

- Windows x64

- MacOS (Intel)

- Linux (Coming Soon)

Recommended specs

- Atleast 2GB DDR3 Dedicated RAM

- Intel/AMD Integrated Graphics GPU

- 1280 x 720 Semi-HD Screen

- Installed prequisites for Unity

I WONDER WHAT'S INSIDE

detailed_description:
Collector's Edition

The spire sure knew how to keep a thing or two down its sleeve. Enrich your Spiredelve experience with never-seen before production art, sketches, music, mixes, and author notes from beyond the wicked tower itself.

What's included:

  • Dekkad's Log - Author's Notes

  • DJ KIT 10 - Spiredelve OST

  • Claymaker's Exhibit - Official Artbook

  • Poems of Disregard - Curated Poetry Collection

  • Animus Almaniac - Animated Enemy Sprites

  • Histrionicism - Collction of curated art from Auteur's depths

  • Spire Max 92 - Editable, open-sourced template

  • And MANY MORE

AVAILABLE: EVERYWHERE IN THE CROSSROADS

NOT INCLUDED: JAVION, FOROTH, COTHRAN, KATHARA, HAVALU

short_description: Explore the ruins of a great and mysterious tower, shrouded in days and worlds long forgotten in a DOOM-inspired FPS classic boomer shooter. Turn adversaries to advantages, and pilfer the coffers of the Editors into scions of wanton killing and discover the secrets that lay beneath the spire.
